basics.name: Nour Haridy
basics.label: Solidity & Javascript Developer
basics.summary: I'm an Ethereum developer and smart contract architect mainly interested in DeFi. I build wallets, dApps, smart contracts and developer tooling.

work.summary: Mosendo aims to push DeFi towards mainstream adoption by providing instant and free transfers of interest-bearing stablecoins using state channels.
highlights: I was tasked with refactoring the Mosendo wallet React Native app in order to add Connext V2 state channels and gasless MCD DAI payments. I also developed the meta-transaction relayer backend and the smart contracts.
I built gasless.mosendo.com, a gasless DAI on-chain wallet.
I architected and implemented the limit order smart contracts used on the Synthetix.exchange.
I implemented the usynth.xyz interface for the UMA protocol.

work.summary: Metacash a gasless non-custodial wallet that allowed SAI payments with fees in SAI instead of Ether
highlights: In January 2019, I published an architecture for backward-compatible gasless token transfers now used by projects such as Coinbase Commerce.

I implemented the same architecture in the form of smart contracts, a relayer and Android App (built with Cordova) in the Metacash Smart Wallet for SAI before native gasless payments were added later to MCD DAI.
The contracts that I wrote were externally audited for security vulnerabilities by Security Innovation: shorturl.at/pCEJ9

work.summary: Bountyhive is a bounty hunting platform, connecting ICOs & bounty hunters
highlights: I implemented the frontend of BountyHive's TokenBatch project (built with Vue.js), a batch transfer tool that saves drastically on gas costs by aggregating up to a hundred transfers of any token in one transaction.
TokenBatch helps BountyHive's clients distribute airdrops and token dividends but can also be used by anyone at https://tokenbatch.io
